Summary: Two white dots zig zagging in the sky, then disappearing.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching a passenger jet flying over Aurora when I saw two white dots in the middle of sky, flying in a zig-zag like way, then they disappeared - they didn't fly off in any direction, they were just gone.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Aurora
There were no other sightings in Aurora on or around July 31st 2012
